Title: Abandoned Yard
RoleContent: It's been deserted for a long time, but you may still find something useful.
EventDesc: You are back at the manor where you woke up. The inside reeks of rot and mildew. You itch to leave but a voice in your head urges you to explore this foreboding manor.

Title: Abandoned Yard
EventDesc: You enter the bedroom of the manor and notice that someone has left an Artifact box for you on the table beside the bed where you woke up.

Title: Abandoned Yard
EventDesc: You are in the manor's storage. After waving away the dust in your face, you find some Tinbread Cookies in a box.

Title: Cradle's gift
RoleContent: Here's a small gift for you... Please take it...
EventDesc: For you, who follow the sound of the tide down the Path of the Curse Quellers, the girl has prepared a tiny gift that may help you on your journey.

Title: Cradle's gift
RoleContent: Hopefully, it'll be helpful on your journey.
EventDesc: A tiny gift may not be enough to clear all that stand in your way, but it carries the thoughts of Cradle.

Title: Everlasting Song
RoleContent: Oh, honored companion, would you care to lend your ear for a piece?
EventDesc: After setting up camp somewhere remote, a bard with ragged clothes sits next to the fire you just started and asks to play you a song about heroes.

Title: Everlasting Song
RoleContent: It's based on an ancient legend...
EventDesc: In the era of the blood-red moon, Crimson devoured the land, forcing heroes to leave their homeland for the sky before waging war against those that took their home—that is the ancient legend, but the bard seems to be hinting that you'll find like-minded companions at locations mentioned in the song.

Title: Everlasting Song
EventDesc: You filter out the bard's mumbling as you drift into sleep from fatigue. By the time you wake up, there is no trace of the bard except the few coins he left as gratitude for sharing your shelter.

Title: Happy times
TitleContent: You walked into Bar Small Town
EventDesc: Bar Small Town is having an exuberant celebration tonight. The Normans, a family of brewers for generations, are providing their townsfolks with this feast. This joyous occasion might be a rare opportunity on this journey for you to find some comfort.

Title: Happy times
TitleContent: You down a few pints in a heartbeat.
RoleContent: ...Shouts of excitement resonate through the crowd...
EventDesc: Your feat has caught the attention of the crowd. A few guests revere your spirit and invite you to join them on their journey.

Title: Happy times
EventDesc: You only drink occasionally for a little uplift and you must keep your head straight at all times for the long journey ahead.

OptionDesc[3]: Refuse the nun's help (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Missionary
RoleContent: Are you a Curse Queller? Please take our...
EventDesc: When the kingdom, once so glorious, fell to calamity, doors to understanding ancient wisdom closed upon the world once more. Seekers of knowledge assemble from far and wide in an attempt to unearth the truth buried under the sands of time. After patiently listening to the history of the church, you sense there is something to be gained even for a non-believer like yourself as the nuns hand out supplies to passersby.

Title: Missionary
TitleContent: You collect supplies given by the church.
RoleContent: Thank you for supporting our church. Please take this as a token of our gratitude.
EventDesc: You accept the nun's kind gesture. They make a prayer for your journey ahead.

Title: Missionary
TitleContent: You collect supplies given by the church.
RoleContent: Thank you for supporting our church. Please take this as a token of our gratitude.
EventDesc: You accept the nun's kind gesture. They make a prayer for your journey ahead.

Title: Missionary
EventDesc: You find it difficult to forget the prayer you heard even though you did not accept the supplies given by the church...

OptionDesc[1]: Try pouring in 3 bottles of Biomimetic Blood
OptionDesc[3]: Like anyone is going to believe this
Title: Wishing Well
EventDesc: A rotten old well out of nowhere attracts your attention. It reminds you of a myth that doesn't hurt to try—dropping coins into dried-up wells for good luck, that is.

Title: Wishing Well
EventDesc: The idea of dropping a few drops of Biomimetic Blood into the well suddenly comes to you. Before you know it, winds pick up dust and swerve around you. When you open your eyes again, a crumpled letter lands at your feet. It contains the location of the outliers yearning for companions.

Title: Wishing Well
EventDesc: You throw a few Tinbread Cookies into the well in anticipation, but nothing happens. Just as you're about to leave, you notice a supply crate behind the rundown well.

Title: Wishing Well
EventDesc: You realize that these myths have no basis so it's better not to waste your money on them.

OptionDesc[1]: Offer 6 Tinbread Cookies for the deal
Title: Homebound Traveler
TitleContent: A chance meeting on the journey
RoleContent: Greetings... Mind if I borrow you for a minute?
EventDesc: You cross paths with a tattered man, an archaeologist who made his way here looking for what rumors say are traces of the crimson creatures. Yet years of pursuit have led to nothing, and the yearning in his heart urges him to sell all that he has so he can finally go home.

Title: Homebound Traveler
RoleContent: Thank you so much for your help. May God be with you on your journey.
EventDesc: You trade some Tinbread Cookies for a few of his items. Hopefully, that will keep him alive on his way to the next village.

Title: Homebound Traveler
EventDesc: You bid farewell to the man you probably will never cross paths with again and wish that he will soon find a way back to his beloved homeland.

Title: Market
TitleContent: You arrive at a busy market.
RoleContent: ...Busy with the sounds of hawkers and shoppers...
EventDesc: There is a busy market in town. After the demise of civilization, these large markets were the key to the economic recovery. This is where you can get items that will be useful during your journey.

Title: Market
RoleContent: This is all I have. Follow the lead and see what you'll find.
EventDesc: You manage to reel some information out of the informant. There are a few interesting characters in this little town with the potential to become your travel companion.

Title: Market
RoleContent: Thank you for your business. Best of luck on your journey.
EventDesc: You manage to get your hands on a good amount of supplies. They will certainly be useful on your journey.

Title: Market
RoleContent: Mark my word. There are treasures in here!
EventDesc: You found a battered chest at an antique stall. The owner claims that the contents are worth a fortune.

Title: Market
EventDesc: You think there are better uses for your funds and leave without purchasing anything.

OptionDesc[2]: Not interested in the plays at all
Title: Traveling Troupe
RoleContent: ...Busy with the sounds of hawkers and shoppers...
EventDesc: A traveling troupe is setting up a stage in this little town to put on their most famous show, The Horizon Blue Sun and the Red Moon. This play is an interpretation of a famous battle in the Mythical Age, where believers holding scepters light themselves up in flames to cleanse the world of disease and death. An admission fee is of course required.

Title: Traveling Troupe
RoleContent: Actress: She's holding a scepter, even though the scepter is...
EventDesc: The play was a big success. After the curtain closes, you sit for a minute to take it all in, while recalling the faces of the actors with adventure gleaming in their eyes.

Title: Traveling Troupe
EventDesc: You're not interested in the play and leave the enthusiastic crowd behind.

OptionDesc[1]: Fulfill his requirements (Enter a difficult battle)
OptionDesc[2]: Keep your distance and leave quickly.
Title: The last warrior
RoleContent: Come, come and join me in the craziest dance you can ever imagine!
EventDesc: A once-famous swordsman is blinded by resentment and asks for nothing but a final dual.

Title: The last warrior
TitleContent: You step into the deep bog of hate.
EventDesc: You decide to end his hatred once in for all and walk straight into him... and into an inevitable and arduous battle.

Title: The last warrior
TitleContent: You free yourself from the hate.
EventDesc: You decide to quickly get yourself out of here. One filled with hatred only spells trouble.

OptionDesc[1]: A Gospel to End All Evil (Enter an arduous battle)
OptionDesc[2]: Keep your distance from her and leave swiftly
Title: Gospel of Death
TitleContent: You hear about the legend of this land.
EventDesc: In the abandoned church on the fringe of town, a nun who embraced the forbidden faith lingers eternally. She seeks to bring to all living souls in this world the final gospel—death.

Title: Gospel of Death
RoleContent: As punishment for your blasphemy, turn to dust!
EventDesc: It is time to end such a malicious gospel.

Title: Gospel of Death
EventDesc: Shouldn't have come this close to someone so foreboding. Let's leave at once!

OptionDesc[1]: Enter to search in the dense forest (Consume 2 Biomimetic Blood)
Title: Lost Child
TitleContent: You meet a blind old woman.
EventDesc: You were wandering the outskirts of town when you met a blind old woman by the roadside. She lost her direction while looking for her son Grey and is offering all of her possessions in exchange for your help, but the forest she points to seems to be crawling with beasts and bandits.

OptionDesc[2]: Tell her that you've found traces of her son
Title: Lost Child
EventDesc: After a long search, you find no trace of Grey in the forest. What do you tell the old lady when you see her?

Title: Lost Child
RoleContent: My child... Help! Somebody, please help...
EventDesc: You sense a malicious aura coming from the forest and finally made the difficult decision to leave without answering the old lady's plea for help.

Title: Lost Child
RoleContent: Thank you... gracious stranger... Seems like I'll have to look elsewhere...
EventDesc: After hearing your explanation, the heartbroken old lady thanks you for your kindness, gifts you the ring she kept for her beloved son, and heads back into town.

Title: Lost Child
RoleContent: God bless... I'm coming... I'm coming, my child...
EventDesc: The old lady believes your words and hands over everything she has before hurrying into the forest alone.

OptionDesc[1]: Treat him to a meal with 6 Tinbread Cookies.
OptionDesc[2]: Give him 2 bottles of Biomimetic Blood
Title: A curse called "knowledge"
RoleContent: What should I do... I've been lost here for far too long...
EventDesc: A starving young lad sits on the side of the road with a troubled expression, which makes him seem out of place in this lively little town.

OptionDesc[1]: Share your experiences of feeling lost with him
OptionDesc[2]: Encourage him to do more research
Title: A curse called "knowledge"
RoleContent: Thank you, kind-hearted stranger. Thank you so much.
EventDesc: Inspired by your passion, the young academic enjoys a pleasant time with you. He reveals that looking for the lost knowledge was an ambition he inherited from his mentor, but he has never felt qualified for this endeavor and is looking for guidance.

Title: A curse called "knowledge"
RoleContent: ...I guess I have no choice... but to go home now...
EventDesc: It's too much work to deal with people like this so you choose to ignore him.

Title: A curse called "knowledge"
TitleContent: You accept the young lad's gift.
RoleContent: Please accept this. I am certain you are the only one who can grasp the wisdom contained in this antique book.
EventDesc: The academic is shocked at the extent of your knowledge. After a moment of thought, he hands you an antique book. It contains ancient wisdom from his school of thought that's been passed down for generations. He laments that someone as dull as he himself will never be able to comprehend the text's wisdom and wishes to pass it on to someone who can.

Title: A curse called "knowledge"
TitleContent: You accept the young lad's gift.
RoleContent: Thank you so much for your encouragement. Please take these. I am certain that these notes will be of use to you.
EventDesc: You encourage the scholar to continue his own journey. He bids you a sorrowful farewell and gives you his notebook with records of his journey, hoping it'll be helpful to you.

OptionDesc[1]: Support his pursuit of dreams with 3 bottles of Biomimetic Blood
OptionDesc[2]: Give him 6 Tinbread Cookies to move on
Title: Full of "potential"!
RoleContent: Hello there, Traveler! Care to learn about some long-lost ancient robotics technology? All you have to do...
EventDesc: An artisan is tirelessly selling his dreams to you on the street of a tiny village. Incomplete knowledge of ancient technology has stalled the advancement of robotics, but this man believes that he has found the key to restoring its past glory. All he needs is some funds to help him build his "groundbreaking invention," or you can choose to pay him to stock up your armory.

Title: Full of "potential"!
TitleContent: The artisan "rebuilt" the robot fighter for you.
RoleContent: I did it! It's not perfect, but that's OK!
EventDesc: With every ounce of his being, the artisan came up with what he thinks is the work of a lifetime. It looks like a fighter robot of the ancient world.

Title: Full of "potential"!
TitleContent: The engineer builds you something confusing.
RoleContent: Fine, fine. I'll make you something because you seem sincere enough.
EventDesc: The engineer is disappointed but still makes an effort to build you an automatic cannon for fire support.

Title: Full of "potential"!
EventDesc: You believe in your skills and don't think you need the help of robots.

OptionDesc[1]: Trade 2 bottles of Biomimetic Blood for useful Artifacts
OptionDesc[2]: Buy some Biomimetic Blood using 6 Tinbread Cookies
Title: Scavengers Party
TitleContent: You meet a group of Scavengers.
RoleContent: Hey buddy, I've got loads of treasures here. Wanna take a look?
EventDesc: In a tiny room inside the fortress, a group of trespassing Scavengers is going through what they've collected after a day of scavenging. A myriad of ancient mechanical parts and supplies of all shapes and sizes scatter across the floor. They offer to sell you some of the items at prices much lower than the market prices.

Title: Scavengers Party
TitleContent: You reach a deal with them.
RoleContent: You've got a sharp eye. We haven't even had a chance to open this one yet.
EventDesc: You trade for some useful "stuff" with the Scavengers. They swear that these will be of great use in the fortress.

Title: Scavengers Party
TitleContent: You reach a deal with them.
RoleContent: This stuff saves lives. You certainly are a sharp one.
EventDesc: You trade for some extra reserves of Biomimetic Blood with the Scavengers. These may be useful in the adventure ahead.

Title: Scavengers Party
EventDesc: You can't trust these money-thirsty Scavengers. Ignoring their invitation, you carry on into the fortress.

Title: Solved Puzzle
EventDesc: This is a room that resembles a chessboard with all sorts of sculptures. It seems to be reenacting a battle while being part of a complex puzzle. One legendary hero stands on either end of the room—one a divine messenger holding a purifying flame, the other a female warrior holding a banner spear. Which would you choose?

Title: Solved Puzzle
EventDesc: You give it a moment's thought before taking the prize, a scepter. You don't know who solved the puzzle, but you thank them in your heart.

Title: Solved Puzzle
EventDesc: You give it a moment's thought before taking the prize, a banner spear. You don't know who solved the puzzle, but you thank them in your heart.

Title: Failure
RoleContent: Even the air has grown heavy
EventDesc: An adventurer from long ago lies dead in the depths of the fortress. He leaves one last line of warning in blood as it runs dry—at the deepest end of the fortress, a Guardian stands watch by the entrance to the sea since the beginning of time. His final wish is for a successor to take his place and seek the truth that lies buried at the bottom of this world.

Title: Failure
EventDesc: You give the adventurer a proper burial, etch his resolution to your heart, carefully pack his belongings and continue your journey with new motivation.

Title: Armory
EventDesc: You barge into one of the armories in the fortress and try to figure out an illegible symbol on a sealed supply crate. It seems to be a coat of arms designed around the runic letter "G". Fortunately, the guards are nowhere to be seen for now. Hurry and look for the supplies you need.

Title: Armory
EventDesc: You decide to open this Artifact box. It might help you on the battlefield.

Title: Armory
EventDesc: You decide to rummage the place for leftover Biomimetic Blood in case of emergency.

Title: Armory
EventDesc: One can never have too much money. Gathering Tinbread Cookies seems like an intelligent choice.

Title: Heed the advice
EventDesc: Deep inside the fortress, in a safe house without patrolling robots, someone is here before you. A man with ragged clothes slumps by the wall with an empty and hopeless expression, as if he has lost his purpose.

Title: Heed the advice
EventDesc: When he realizes that you're a newcomer, he begins to recount to you the history of this fortress. It is part of the remains of a major battle in the Mythical Age and carries traces of advanced ancient technology. Countless secrets are hidden behind secure mechanisms while lost intelligent machines wander the empty halls.

Title: Heed the advice
EventDesc: He came here on the church's wishes to uncover secrets buried in this fortress, but the expedition was hit with many perils from which he is the lone survivor. He no longer has the strength to go further into the fortress but stays to provide relentless seekers after him with supplies to help them on their quest.

Title: Heed the advice
EventDesc: You accept a few Tinbread Cookies the man took from his stash and head toward the depths of the fortress.

Title: Heed the advice
EventDesc: The man gives you information on the other adventurers in the fortress that will help you expand your team.

OptionDesc[1]: Purchase the "Red Teardrop Pendant" using 10 Tinbread Cookies.
OptionDesc[2]: Purchase the "Blue Teardrop Pendant" using 10 Tinbread Cookies.
OptionDesc[4]: State that you don't have the gem
Title: Jewel Hunter
RoleContent: Hey there, I happen to have some precious treasures. Want to have a look?
EventDesc: Inside the fort, you meet a man covered from head to toe in black. He claims to be a passionate jewel collector on his way to the ocean floor to look for rare treasures and would be happy to exchange information with you.

Title: Jewel Hunter
TitleContent: You reach a deal with the jewel hunter.
RoleContent: Thank you. Thank you very much. It was a pleasure doing business with you.
EventDesc: You reach a good deal with the man in black and take the Red Teardrop Pendant.

Title: Jewel Hunter
TitleContent: You reach a deal with the jewel hunter.
RoleContent: Thank you. Thank you very much. It was a pleasure doing business with you.
EventDesc: You reach a good deal with the man in black and take the Blue Teardrop Pendant.

Title: Jewel Hunter
TitleContent: You reach a deal with the jewel hunter.
RoleContent: Thank you. Thank you very much. It was a pleasure doing business with you.
EventDesc: You reach a good deal with the man in black and take the Red and the Blue Teardrop Pendant.

Title: Jewel Hunter
TitleContent: You don't have anything to offer.
RoleContent: Nothing...? That's unfortunate... Well, I'll be on my way, then...
EventDesc: You state that you don't have any treasure to offer for this deal and the jewel hunter leaves in disappointment.

Title: Jewel Hunter
RoleContent: Wait... This... I will offer you everything I have for this!
EventDesc: The man shows immense interest in your ring and states that he is willing to trade all of his gems (Red and Blue Teardrop Pendant) for your Merlin's Jewel.

Title: Jewel Hunter
TitleContent: The jewel hunter is trying to change your mind.
RoleContent: Still no? What if I add one more? I swear this is all the gems I have!
EventDesc: He frantically stops you as he sees that you are not pleased with his offer and declares that he can add in another Yellow Teardrop Pendant.

Title: Jewel Hunter
RoleContent: Great. Wonderful. I'm glad you are up for the deal. Thank you very much.
EventDesc: The man in black reached a deal with you even though he is a little reluctant.

Title: Jewel Hunter
TitleContent: The jewel hunter breaks into a bawl.
RoleContent: No, wait... Please give it another thought... Wait... Please...
EventDesc: You decide to turn down the man's solicitation and keep the gem.

Title: The wisdom named "Forbiddance"
RoleContent: Only the sound of dripping water
EventDesc: You discover a carefully hidden dungeon deep within the tunnel. Inside, a decomposed corpse sits with its hands cuffed to the wall and an antique book—that's giving off an ominous, cursed aura—next to its feet. The text looks like a learning tool for a language long-lost.

Title: The wisdom named "Forbiddance"
RoleContent: You bring with you the Cursed Power.
EventDesc: You grab the Cursed Antique Book, but the power that the Forbidden Knowledge brings comes with a price.

Title: The wisdom named "Forbiddance"
EventDesc: You clear your mind before you pore through the antique book until daybreak. To your surprise, the forgotten language is needed to understand the antique book the young academic has given you. You uncover its wisdom and got a glimpse of the ultimate enlightenment.

Title: The wisdom named "Forbiddance"
RoleContent: Only the sound of dripping water
EventDesc: You leave quickly, knowing all too well that there is a price to pay for stealing a peek at the Forbidden Knowledge.

Title: Executioner
TitleContent: You notice danger approaching from afar.
EventDesc: Creations from the ancient civilization wander the halls of the fortress. Wielding its heavy greatsword, an intelligent machine with self-consciousness will cut down every intruder.

Title: Executioner
TitleContent: You decide to start a challenge.
EventDesc: Such a dangerous machine should not be left unchecked. It's time to put it to an end.

Title: Executioner
TitleContent: You decide to avoid the fight.
EventDesc: Best to avoid a machine as dangerous as this.

OptionDesc[1]: Use 3 Biomimetic Blood to treat him
Title: Warrior Who Survived
EventDesc: A badly wounded soldier lies motionless in a room at the end of the tunnel. Judging from his state and attire, he must be part of the religious expedition and will not last long if he does not get treated in time.

OptionDesc[2]: He goes back to the ground for recovery.
Title: Warrior Who Survived
RoleContent: Thank you for saving my life. I will tell you what happened earlier.
EventDesc: You patch up the lucky survivor and stop his bleeding. As his condition stabilizes, he begins to tell you his story. His expedition was wiped out during a battle with the Guardian, leaving him wandering alone in the tunnel. He searched continuously for a way to the core of the fortress, but to no avail. He advises you to abandon your quest because the other side of the deep sea is not what a mortal can bear.

Title: Warrior Who Survived
RoleContent: I understand that you don't have extra supplies. Go. Don't worry about me.
EventDesc: The horrible state that the warrior is in shakes you to the core, but sadly, without any extra supplies, there's nothing you can do for him but leave.

Title: Warrior Who Survived
RoleContent: Thank you for having faith in me. I will fight 'til my last breath.
EventDesc: You gather that an experienced warrior can provide you with a wealth of knowledge down the road and attempt once more to persuade him to follow you into the sea. He agrees without hesitation.

Title: Warrior Who Survived
RoleContent: You should choose an item from the box if you insist on going. It'll come in handy.
EventDesc: You thank the warrior for his advice but tell him that you will not stop here. He hands you all of his equipment, hoping that it will turn the odds in your favor.

Title: Final Treatment
RoleContent: Hi... Do you... require... m-medical attention.
EventDesc: A commercial medic bot from the last century wanders up and down the tunnel. It seems to still be carrying a few sets of medical supplies. You can also disassemble and see what you can find.

Title: Final Treatment
EventDesc: As the medic bot takes out medical supplies, it uses up the last bit of its power.

Title: Final Treatment
EventDesc: After spending quite some time taking the robot apart, you discover its storage space.

Title: Discarded Roundtable
TitleContent: You barge in somewhere you don't belong.
EventDesc: You accidentally open a secret door in the tunnel and enter a completely different world. An elegant roundtable stands in the middle of the majestic, solemn room. This is a place every outlier dreams of for their beginning and end. On the table, the final invitation awaits.

Title: Discarded Roundtable
TitleContent: You depart from where you don't belong.
EventDesc: Neither you nor I have ever been alone, Curse Queller—reads the line on the letter.

Title: Burnt-Out Campfire
TitleContent: You found a camp of another Curse Queller.
RoleContent: Not even a dying ember left in the campfire.
EventDesc: A burnt-out campfire comes into view at one end of the tunnel. It looks abandoned, but neatly arranged in a pile beside it are some Artifacts, Tinbread Cookies, and a simple note that reads, "For the one after me, and the one after."

Title: Burnt-Out Campfire
RoleContent: You feel a trace of warmth.
EventDesc: You respect the intention of the writer and take the supplies, but leave the Artifacts for whoever might come next.

Title: Burnt-Out Campfire
RoleContent: You feel a trace of warmth.
EventDesc: You respect the intention of the writer and take an Artifact, but leave the supplies for whoever might come next.

OptionDesc[1]: Take the Biomimetic Blood offered as a sacrifice
OptionDesc[2]: Take the blade offered a as sacrifice
OptionDesc[3]: Attempt to interpret the inscriptions (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Crumbled Religious Monument
EventDesc: A crumbling monument stands alone deep inside the tunnel, the letters on it illegible from years of corrosion. Those who would pray to it have long been lost to time, and all that remains is a few relics hidden away in this lightless corner.

Title: Crumbled Religious Monument
TitleContent: You take the offerings at the altar.
EventDesc: You take the Biomimetic Blood that was there as an offering as a gift from thousand years past.

Title: Crumbled Religious Monument
TitleContent: You take the blade from the altar.
EventDesc: You take the blade that was there as an offering. Works of bladesmiths from eons ago must be unlike those from the present. Surely this blade will have its unique uses.

Title: Crumbling Religious Monument
TitleContent: You take the blade from the altar.
EventDesc: You try to decipher the ancient inscriptions on the monument. The texts tell of a once-magnificent civilization brought down by a sudden catastrophe. As you read, fragmented tales of bygone eras come alive before you, and you seem to gain some insight.

Title: The Brand of Void
RoleContent: A Statue of the Devil stands erect
EventDesc: At the end of a tunnel that's different from the one leading to the bottom of the ocean is a battered Statue of the Devil. In the Devil's hand is a branding iron, burning eternally as it awaits its next victim who will inherit the Forbidden Brand.

Title: The Brand of Void
EventDesc: You extend your left arm to let the ancient curse course into your body. The indelible marks that will follow you to your grave burn in your body without a moment's rest. You struggle your way out as you hold in the pain.

Title: The Brand of Void
RoleContent: It is unwise to stay here for long.
EventDesc: Cradle stops you in your tracks. This curse is much more than what someone like you can bear.

OptionDesc[1]: Use 3 bottles of Biomimetic Blood to forcefully take the gem.
OptionDesc[2]: Embed Merlin's Jewel into your right eye
Title: Statue of the Crowned
EventDesc: At the very end of a long and bleak tunnel, a statue of someone about to be crowned stands firm in front of you. Embedded in its left eye is a diamond emitting bright, violet shimmers, while the right eye looks strangely empty. After a closer look, you are certain that there are hidden mechanisms.

Title: Statue of the Crowned
EventDesc: You smash through the statue's secret mechanisms with brute force, damaging the gem in the process.

Title: Statue of the Crowned
EventDesc: You are not interested in the statue and decide to carry on with your journey.

OptionDesc[2]: Take the Amethyst of the Indigo Waves
Title: Statue of the Crowned
TitleContent: A hidden compartment of the statue pops out
RoleContent: A crackling noise is coming out of the hidden compartment.
EventDesc: After a few low rumbles, a hidden compartment on the statue pops out. You figure out the mechanisms in the statue and realize that you need to choose between the gem embedded in the right and left eye sockets.

Title: Statue of the Crowned
TitleContent: A hidden compartment of the statue pops back in
RoleContent: A crackling noise is coming out of the hidden compartment.
EventDesc: There is something about this gem that speaks to you and you decide to keep it.

Title: Statue of the Crowned
TitleContent: A hidden compartment of the statue pops back in
RoleContent: A crackling noise is coming out of the hidden compartment.
EventDesc: The glimmering purple gem is more to your liking and you decide to take it.

Title: An end named "Lunacy"
TitleContent: You notice danger approaching from afar.
RoleContent: Knowledge... I must find more knowledge...
EventDesc: Countless have fallen and lost their souls on the way in their endless search for the origin of the world. The crazed young man in front of you is only but one.

Title: An end named "Lunacy"
TitleContent: You decide to start a challenge.
RoleContent: You... Do you wish to become my knowledge...?
EventDesc: It is time to put these vile sins to an end.

Title: An End Named "Lunacy"
TitleContent: You notice danger approaching from afar.
EventDesc: The future might hold many unknown dangers. It's better not to risk it all now.

OptionDesc[1]: Place 10 Tinbread Cookies on the altar.
OptionDesc[2]: You are not interested in these altars.
Title: Crimson Altar
EventDesc: A mahogany altar sits quietly in the corner of the aquarium, its surfaces a relief showing various legendary crimson creatures. The bottom of the altar is rigged with hidden mechanisms and requires a sacrifice to activate.

Title: Crimson Altar
TitleContent: You present it with an offering.
EventDesc: You lay a few coins onto the altar and the mechanism on the bottom pops open, showing sacrifices that were hidden out of your sight earlier.

Title: Crimson Altar
EventDesc: You ignore this eerie altar and turn to leave.

OptionDesc[1]: Use 3 bottles of Biomimetic Blood to complete the painting
Title: Another starry sky
TitleContent: You notice a starry sky that is missing a piece.
EventDesc: In an open space inside the aquarium, giant murals fill the entire dome. Luminous star clusters gleam in a tranquil night sky, but the giant painting seems to be missing a piece.

Title: Another starry sky
EventDesc: As you finish filling the missing part of the sky with Biomimetic Blood instead of paint, all the stars on the screen explode in rainbow colors. The sky cracks in half before the remains of a meteor fall from it. It is a product not of the civilizations of this world.

Title: Another starry sky
EventDesc: You don't feel qualified to participate in the restoration of such a masterpiece and leave silently.

Title: Crimson Saint
EventDesc: Deep in the aquarium is a tiny hall built by believers of an ancient forbidden faith to worship the crimson creatures. Inside the abandoned hall, a girl in a deep crimson robe rests motionlessly on a chair. This is where the last successor of this forbidden faith took her last breath.

Title: Crimson Saint
EventDesc: The church left behind a considerable amount of wealth. Though it is not rightfully yours, you can probably put it to better use.

Title: Crimson Saint
EventDesc: You take the scripture left by the church that contains a thorough map of the deep sea. The aquarium has a lot more passages than you thought and footsteps of the Roundtable echo through the walls. Perhaps you will be lucky enough to find survivors of the Crimson Corrosion.

Title: Remnants of Gunfire
EventDesc: At the end of a narrow passage is a vast expanse of space. It looks to be a historic battle site littered with countless remains of crimson creatures and bits of machines piled into heaps. Thousands of years have not washed away any signs of the ghastly, bleak devastation.

Title: Remnants of Gunfire
EventDesc: You explore the remnants of this battle. The sky has been silent for thousands of dawns and dusks, but many of the supplies are still usable.

Title: Remnants of Gunfire
TitleContent: You try to search for traces of others.
EventDesc: You explore the area around the ancient battlefield. You meet a few adventurers from the Ancient Roundtable who have set up camp near the ruins, but after decades of wandering, they are happy to join your cause.

OptionDesc[1]: Explore the area to see if you can find anything
Title: Dusty Memories
EventDesc: Deep inside the aquarium, in an unusually spacy area, stand the remains of a mechanical structure built using ancient technology. It looks to be part of a giant building, but its appearance is a reminder of the ship named "Eden" in the Mythical Age that once carried the heroes. Now, however, it lies at the bottom of the world as if to seal away with it all the legends from the beginning of time.

Title: Dusty Memories
TitleContent: There is nothing you can do.
EventDesc: Unfortunately, you failed to find a way into the remains, as if it were trying to reject the visits of those after its time. You search for supplies around the remains and leave disappointed.

Title: Before the journey ends...
RoleContent: Curse Queller... your journey's end is within your reach... Please accept my gift...
EventDesc: The long, arduous journey is coming to an end and the girl's duty will end with it, but she still wishes to be of service to you while it lasts.

Title: Before the journey ends...
TitleContent: She leaves for a short while.
EventDesc: No matter where you end up, she will be there to witness your destiny.

OptionDesc[1]: Be ready and leave no regrets
Title: Approaching Tide
RoleContent: Water that hits the curtains over and over sounds like the rise and fall of the waves.
EventDesc: The end of your journey is near as the low rumbles of the tide get louder. You check your equipment to make sure you are ready for what's to come.

Title: Approaching Tide
RoleContent: Water that hits the curtains over and over sounds like the rise and fall of the waves.
EventDesc: You clear out the entire perimeter, taking anything that might be of use for what's coming.

Title: The Brand of Infinity
RoleContent: A Statue of the Angle stands erect
EventDesc: At an eerie corner of the ocean bottom, you discover a sacred palace, where an ivory white angle stands in the center. With a branding iron that burns eternally in its hand, it's ready to bless the next believer with its divine prayers.

Title: The Brand of Infinity
EventDesc: You extend your right arm to let the ancient blessing trickle into your body. Golden marks that shine eternally purify every inch of your body. You enjoy feeling as light as air as you gently float out.

Title: The Brand of Infinity
EventDesc: Cradle stops you in your tracks. This blessing may not be what it seems.

OptionDesc[1]: Help him escape (Enter a difficult battle)
Title: Seduced by the Abyss
TitleContent: You notice danger approaching from afar.
EventDesc: In the deep depths of the sea, wails of the lost can be heard not far away. Ghosts of war roaming the shore of the abyss yearn to be freed.

Title: Seduced by the Abyss
TitleContent: You decide to start a challenge.
RoleContent: You... It's you... It's gotta be you!
EventDesc: You can't bear to leave him to suffer alone and decides to set him free.

Title: Abyssal Captive
TitleContent: You decide to avoid the fight.
RoleContent: I want to go back home... my real home...
EventDesc: Such agonizing wails must spell danger. Better make a detour.

Title: Ocean Guardian
TitleContent: The Ocean Guardian glares at you from atop a watch tower.
EventDesc: You arrive at the end of the fortress where the underwater tunnel begins. The Guardian has been waiting for you.

Title: Ocean Guardian
TitleContent: The Ocean Guardian raises its spear.
RoleContent: Guardian of the Ocean. Gatekeeper of Forbiddance.
EventDesc: The unfortunate soul destined to be trapped by ignorance.

Title: Ocean Guardian
TitleContent: The Ocean Guardian gives a warning.
RoleContent: Guardian of the Ocean. Gatekeeper of Forbiddance.
EventDesc: Your wishful thinking must be quenched.

Title: Ocean Guardian
TitleContent: The Ocean Guardian leaps down from its towering lookout as the sky churns and dims.

Title: Ocean Guardian
TitleContent: The Ocean Guardian prepares for battle.
EventDesc: The only way through is to defeat her.

Title: After Clash
TitleContent: The Tree Guardian has been defeated.
EventDesc: The last trace of the Guardian fades as the entrance to the ocean depths opens.

Title: After Clash
TitleContent: The entrance to the sea is opening up slowly.
EventDesc: Let's go. We're now one step closer to our goal.

OptionDesc[2]: Leave the dagger as is (Continue with journey)
Title: After Clash
RoleContent: Nor too far away on the ground
EventDesc: You carefully scan your surroundings and notice that an exquisite dagger sits where the Guardian last took her breath.

Title: After Clash
RoleContent: The entrance to the sea is now completely open.
EventDesc: You shake off any second thoughts and enter the underwater tunnel with Cradle.

Title: After Clash
EventDesc: You recall the words of the Guardian. She seems to hold an intense animosity toward Cradle. You pick up the dagger and head down the underwater tunnel as you contemplate these thoughts.

Title: After Clash
RoleContent: The entrance to the sea is now completely open.
EventDesc: You pick up the dagger without a second thought and enter the tunnel with Cradle.

Title: Cursed Waves
TitleContent: The ending is about to begin.
RoleContent: A girl who guides Curse Quellers
EventDesc: You have arrived at the bottom of the deep ocean, the origin of the world. A spot of eerie light shines bright. You know all too well that it is the source of all evils of the world, the instigator of the sound of the tide.

OptionDesc[3]: But I have not learned the truth of this world.
OptionDesc[4]: I want to keep exploring (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Cursed Waves
TitleContent: The ending is about to begin.
RoleContent: A girl who guides Curse Quellers
EventDesc: Shattered lights and shadows gather into a bouquet—the cycle of doom is at its end... Touch it, for our duty ends here.

Title: Cursed Waves
TitleContent: The ending is about to begin.
RoleContent: A girl who guides Curse Quellers
EventDesc: You do as Cradle says and touch the ball of light with your hand. It is clear that this will be the last battle.

Title: Cursed Waves
TitleContent: The ending is about to begin.
RoleContent: A girl who guides Curse Quellers
EventDesc: Why was she entrusted with this duty? What is the truth of the sound of the tide? After a long and arduous journey, you have received no answer. Suspicion bubbles in your heart. It is time to take your destiny back into your hands.

Title: Cursed Waves
EventDesc: You thrust your dagger into Cradle. Her blood drips from the sheath... and flows a distance before changing, evolving, and turning into another shape.

Title: Cursed Waves
TitleContent: The ending is about to begin.
RoleContent: A girl who guides Curse Quellers
EventDesc: The truth of the world...? There is no truth, only meaningless struggles.

Title: Cursed Waves
TitleContent: The ending is about to begin.
RoleContent: Your arms... why are they flickering.
EventDesc: The burning sensation on your arms is telling a different story. You now know very well that Cradle did not tell the truth and you have acquired the qualifications to go further and deeper.

Title: Cursed Waves
EventDesc: You pass by Cradle and thrust your hands deeper into the dark. The two brands shine with light so bright it seems to light up the entire world. When you open your eyes, a whole new world lies in front of you.

Title: Cursed Waves
RoleContent: A girl who guides Curse Quellers
EventDesc: So... you've finally decided to take this step?

Title: Cursed Waves
RoleContent: A girl who guides Curse Quellers
EventDesc: You take Cradle's hand, letting her guide you to the very heart of this world.

Title: What's Called "Reality"
EventDesc: The barren world away from land. Look up slightly to see the sapphire planet.

Title: What's Called "Reality"
EventDesc: You know that this is not "real." It's nothing but a passing nightmare.

Title: What's Called "Reality"
EventDesc: The final trial is not far ahead. To reach "Reality", this is the last step. Defeat it to reach the real destination!

OptionDesc[1]: Explore after drinking 2 bottles of Biomimetic Blood
Title: Dream of Mist
EventDesc: Hit by unusual fatigue, you end your travels early. You find somewhere to rest up for the day and fall deeply asleep. When you next open your eyes, you are deep in a mist and feel nauseous. If nothing is done you will be unable to move.

Title: Dream of Mist
EventDesc: You find a large withered tree—from whose rotten core is oozing silver-white liquid.

Title: Dream of Mist
EventDesc: You walk into a tattered shed. It is empty except for the few coins left in a box.

Title: Dream of Mist
EventDesc: You arrive at a hill that has witnessed harrowing battles. Among the whitened bones scattered across the field, you find some items that can still be of use.

Title: Dream of Mist
EventDesc: You stop in front of a tombstone cracked in half with the top missing. The writing on it seems to state the location of friends of the deceased.

Title: Dream of Mist
EventDesc: You make it through the mist only to find yourself deep within more. One slip and you are in a pool of Biomimetic Blood. You jolt awake before realizing that it was only a nightmare and that all your empty bottles have been filled with Biomimetic Blood...

Title: Dream of Mist
EventDesc: You are unable to find anything useful for the mist is too thick.

OptionDesc[1]: Explore after drinking 2 bottles of Biomimetic Blood
Title: Dream of Mist
EventDesc: The mist has yet to disperse, but it looks like you can continue forward.

Title: Dream of Mist
EventDesc: Violent winds pick up and disperse the mist. You realize you're back where you were resting earlier and it was all a bizarre dream.

OptionDesc[2]: Not worth it. Time to go
Title: Sharky Box
RoleContent: ...It might be waiting for Tinbread Cookies...
EventDesc: A shark-shaped box is left on the side of the road. It is a mechanism made with ancient technologies. With its mouth wide open, the shark seems to take coins in exchange for supplies.

Title: Sharky Box
EventDesc: You drop some coins into the box and close it. To your surprise, the shark spits out more coins.

Title: Sharky Box
EventDesc: You drop some coins into the box and close it. To your surprise, the shark spits out bottles of Biomimetic Blood.

Title: Sharky Box
EventDesc: You drop some coins into the box and close it. After some violent trembles, the shark spits out a few Artifacts.

Title: Sharky Box
EventDesc: You drop some coins into the box and close it. After some violent trembles, the shark spits out an invitation letter.

Title: Sharky Box
EventDesc: You drop some coins into the box and close it. The shark spits out a pile of Tinbread Cookies but moves no more. You leave in disappointment.

Title: Sharky Box
EventDesc: You drop some coins into the box and close it but nothing comes out of the shark's mouth...

OptionDesc[2]: Not worth it. Time to go
Title: Sharky Box
EventDesc: Looks like you can drop more coins into this box.

Title: Sharky Box
EventDesc: You put down the weird box and leave.

Title: After Clash
TitleContent: The Tree Guardian has been defeated.
EventDesc: The last trace of the Guardian fades as the entrance to the ocean depths opens.

Title: After Clash
TitleContent: The entrance to the sea is opening up slowly.
EventDesc: Let's go. We're now one step closer to our goal.

Title: After Clash
RoleContent: The entrance to the sea is now completely open.
EventDesc: You shake off any second thoughts and enter the underwater tunnel with Cradle.

Title: Cursed Waves
TitleContent: The ending is about to begin.
EventDesc: You have arrived at the bottom of the deep ocean, the origin of the world. A spot of eerie light shines bright. You know all too well that it is the source of all evils of the world, the instigator of the sound of the tide.

Title: Cursed Waves
TitleContent: The ending is about to begin.
EventDesc: Shattered lights and shadows gather into a bouquet—the cycle of doom is at its end... Touch it, for our duty ends here.

Title: Cursed Waves
TitleContent: The ending is about to begin.
EventDesc: You do as Cradle says and touch the ball of light with your hand. It is clear that this will be the last battle.

Title: Lost Remains
TitleContent: You walk deep into the forest.
RoleContent: The serene depths of the forest.
EventDesc: Deep within the forest lies a murky swamp, a grave for countless outcasts banished by the church. Those thieves and rogues that once formed a formidable syndicate are now forgotten by time.

Title: Lost Remains
TitleContent: You walk deep into the swamp.
RoleContent: Relics and skeletons are scattered everywhere.
EventDesc: In the depths of the swamp, you find materials that might just be useful for your journey.

OptionDesc[1]: Step forward and give it a try
Title: Street Performer
RoleContent: Step right up! I'm the riddle master. Who dares to challenge me?
EventDesc: A street performer from the next town over is setting up a stall. It seems you can spend Tinbread Cookies to play a card guessing game with him for rewards.

Title: Street Performer
TitleContent: You take a seat at the gaming table.
RoleContent: You have a special aura about you. Today, you will be my opponent.
EventDesc: You eagerly sit across from the performer. After paying the entrance fee, you're asked to choose a card from the spread before you and guess its rank.

Title: Street Performer
RoleContent: A corner of the town street.
EventDesc: You've no time for tricksters and their games, so you walk away.

Title: Street Performer
RoleContent: Win some, lose some—that's how it goes! Feel free to come back for a rematch!
EventDesc: The cards aren't playing nice. After many losses and few wins, the performer, perhaps pitying you, hands over some finely crafted souvenirs.

Title: Street Performer
RoleContent: He seems to be staring hard at the backs of your cards.
EventDesc: Your sharp wits catch details others might miss—the performer's cheating! What are you going to do?

Title: Street Performer
RoleContent: Blast it, I'm broke! Can't pay her protection money now. Time to skip town!
EventDesc: You counter the performer's cheats and win round after round, pocketing a day's earnings. The performer packs up and slinks away, defeated.

Title: Street Performer
RoleContent: Woah, woah, woah, buddy! Take this, just take it. Let's pretend none of this ever happened, alright?
EventDesc: Seeing you're about to expose his tricks, the performer hastily tries to stop you. He offers you a treasured item he's always kept, hoping you'll keep his secret.

Title: Forbidden Church
EventDesc: An abandoned church lies at the town's edge, its doors sealed. Here, heretics studying Crimson creatures once gathered. Now, their knowledge is lost, precluding any research on the subject.

Title: Forbidden Church
TitleContent: A wave of dizziness washes over you.
EventDesc: Driven by intense curiosity, you step into the abandoned church. Here, you discover an untouched fragment of a scroll.

Title: Forbidden Church
EventDesc: The words on the scroll fragment beckon you to explore the essence of the world. It seems you're now one step closer to understanding the world you're in.

Title: Forbidden Church
EventDesc: Repelled by the forbidden knowledge, you decide to leave.

OptionDesc[1]: Land on the coast and start the cleansing
Title: Trial of Nothingness
EventDesc: Before true rebirth can begin, you must face the trials of the Crimson.

Title: Trial of Nothingness
EventDesc: The first trial is "Nothingness". All wisdom gained will return to its original form, becoming the foundation to reshape all.

OptionDesc[1]: Break the obstacles and start the cleansing
Title: Trial of Infinity
EventDesc: Eradicate all remnants of will. Let the Crimson consume this doomed world.

Title: Trial of Infinity
EventDesc: The second trial is "Infinity". A new life is about to emerge, and everything from the old world will meet its end.

OptionDesc[1]: Leave no trace, wipe it all
Title: Trial of Eternal Darkness
EventDesc: The birth of the new world is just one step away. All that's left to do is eliminate the remaining obstacles.

Title: Trial of Eternal Darkness
EventDesc: The third trial is "Eternal Darkness". Embrace the Crimson and become a part of the new world.

Title: New World
EventDesc: As the harbinger of the new world, you will draw the final curtain on this fabricated reality.

Title: New World
EventDesc: The only obstacle left is the Crimson itself. You turn the blade, pointing it at the Crimson.

Title: The Other Round Table
EventDesc: In the deepest, most concealed corner of the fortress, a round table, corroded by the Crimson, lies toppled. It appears to be a ritual prop used by the Crimson Order to summon its followers. Beside the table, an invitation imbued with the Crimson aura waits to be opened.

Title: The Other Round Table
EventDesc: You pick up the crimson invitation. It grants you the power to invite your allies to join you on the quest for truth.

Title: The Other Round Table
EventDesc: Feeling it's beyond your current capabilities to accept such a perilous invitation, you decide it's safer to collect more artifacts.

Title: The Other Round Table
EventDesc: In the deepest, most concealed corner of the fortress, a round table, corroded by the Crimson, lies toppled. It appears to be a ritual prop used by the Crimson Order to summon its followers. Beside the table, an invitation imbued with the Crimson aura waits to be opened.

Title: The Other Round Table
EventDesc: You pick up the crimson invitation. It grants you the power to invite your allies to join you on the quest for truth.

Title: The Other Round Table
EventDesc: Feeling it's beyond your current capabilities to accept such a perilous invitation, you decide it's safer to collect more artifacts.

Title: Path of Fate
RoleContent: I bet you're eager to know your fate.
EventDesc: A mysterious fortune teller blocks your path. She seems quite intrigued by you and offers a complimentary glimpse into your future.

OptionDesc[2]: Draw the "Traveler" card (requires activation of Insight)
OptionDesc[3]: Draw the "Chariot" card (requires activation of Insight)
OptionDesc[4]: Draw the "Hanged Man" card (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Path of Fate
EventDesc: Time to reveal your fate...

OptionDesc[2]: Draw the "Chariot" card (requires activation of Insight)
OptionDesc[3]: Draw the "Hanged Man" card (requires activation of Insight)
OptionDesc[4]: Draw the "Demon" card (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Path of Fate
EventDesc: Time to reveal your fate...

OptionDesc[2]: Draw the "Hanged Man" card (requires activation of Insight)
OptionDesc[3]: Draw the "Demon" card (requires activation of Insight)
OptionDesc[4]: Draw the "Traveler" card (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Path of Fate
EventDesc: Time to reveal your fate...

OptionDesc[2]: Draw the "Demon" card (requires activation of Insight)
OptionDesc[3]: Draw the "Traveler" card (requires activation of Insight)
OptionDesc[4]: Draw the "Chariot" card (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Path of Fate
EventDesc: Time to reveal your fate...

Title: Path of Fate
EventDesc: You flip the card, revealing a traveler crowned with laurel, a staff on his shoulder. As you set down the card, the fortune teller is nowhere to be found, but there seem to be additional items on the table.

Title: Path of Fate
EventDesc: You flip the card, revealing an unstoppable, glittering Chariot that symbolizes "victory." As you set down the card, the fortune teller is nowhere to be found, but there seem to be additional items on the table.

Title: Path of Fate
EventDesc: You flip the card, revealing a prisoner hanged upside down on the gallows. As you set down the card, the fortune teller is nowhere to be found, but there seem to be additional items on the table.

Title: Path of Fate
EventDesc: You flip the card, revealing a demon so hideous as if ready to devour all that exist. As you set down the card, the fortune teller is nowhere to be found, but there seem to be additional items on the table.

OptionDesc[2]: Help the heretic (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Faction Conflict
RoleContent: A corner in the depths of the fortress.
EventDesc: Somewhere in the fortress, a church executioner is in pursuit of a heretic, vowing to hang the remnants of the malevolent Crimson Order in the town square. The executioner, seeing you pass by, asks for your assistance. What do you choose?

Title: Faction Conflict
TitleContent: You choose to assist the executioner.
RoleContent: A corner in the depths of the fortress.
EventDesc: You help the executioner capture the frenzied heretic. The executioner expresses his gratitude and assures you that you can count on the church's support on your journey.

Title: Faction Conflict
TitleContent: You choose to help the heretic.
RoleContent: A corner in the depths of the fortress.
EventDesc: You help the heretic escape the pursuit of the executioner. Although their sanity is frayed, they still offer you a treasure they've been safeguarding as a token of thanks.

Title: Faction Conflict
RoleContent: A corner in the depths of the fortress.
EventDesc: Wanting no part in their conflict, you respond to neither party's request and quickly leave the place.

OptionDesc[2]: Read the debunked dark history books
OptionDesc[3]: Read the incomprehensible theological debates (requires activation of Insight)
Title: The Library
RoleContent: The hidden library within the fortress.
EventDesc: Tucked away in the fortress is a library, a trove of materials and precious antique books unreachable to the outside world. With limited time, what do you choose to read?

Title: The Library
TitleContent: You open a book of fairy tales
RoleContent: The hidden library within the fortress.
EventDesc: You flip through several fairy tales popular centuries ago, and the intricate fables seem to hide clues. These clues lead you to a hidden treasure within the fortress.

Title: The Library
TitleContent: You open the fabricated history book.
RoleContent: The hidden library within the fortress.
EventDesc: You flip through a history book that's long proven to be a fabrication. It narrates an alternative side of the Mythic War, in which "the Chosen Ones" manipulating Crimson creatures to fight against the heroes seem to be the very entities worshipped by the Crimson Order.

Title: The Library
TitleContent: You open a book containing heretic's debates.
RoleContent: The hidden library within the fortress.
EventDesc: You peruse the debates left by a heretical philosopher. Within these seemingly illogical texts, there appears to be a wisdom you've yet to fathom.

Title: Sword Tomb
EventDesc: The church's expedition team lies buried at the deepest part of the tunnels, their rusty silver swords and lances standing as their tombstones. This place has been corroded by the Crimson creatures, and it seems you can't venture any further.

Title: Sword Tomb
RoleContent: You avoid the Crimson and find a path.
EventDesc: Drawing on your knowledge of the Crimson creatures, you skillfully evade their corrosion. In the heart of the Sword Tomb, a silver lance is plunged into an expedition member's corpse. You remove the ornament on the lance as proof of witnessing their end.

Title: Sword Tomb
TitleContent: You have gathered supplies in the perimeter.
RoleContent: You search the perimeter for supplies.
EventDesc: You cautiously scout the perimeter, scraping together some potentially useful supplies.

OptionDesc[1]: Examine the astronomical telescope (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Astronomical Wonder
RoleContent: You come across an abandoned observatory.
EventDesc: An abandoned observatory resides in a corner of the tunnels. Perhaps before the world was ravaged, this place was not submerged deep underwater, but a spot where the starry sky was visible?

Title: Astronomical Wonder
RoleContent: You try to use the battered telescope.
EventDesc: You approach the telescope with curiosity, only to find strange symbols engraved on the lens. You feel as though you've grasped something profound...

Title: Astronomical Wonder
RoleContent: You try to gather supplies around.
EventDesc: You scavenge around the observatory and find some supplies before leaving the place.

OptionDesc[1]: Draw hidden lines with Biomimetic Blood (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Mysterious Wall
TitleContent: What do you decide to do?
EventDesc: In a corner deep within the tunnels, a wall with an indented outline catches your attention. It seems there's a way to open it, and you decide to...

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: With the aid of your Insight, you discern the hidden line patterns on the door. After smearing the lines with Biomimetic Blood, the wall dissolves... Before you, numerous mysterious emblems emerge, and you decide to...

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: With the aid of your Insight, you discern the hidden line patterns on the door. After smearing the lines with Biomimetic Blood, the wall dissolves... Before you, numerous mysterious emblems emerge, and you decide to...

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: With the aid of your Insight, you discern the hidden line patterns on the door. After smearing the lines with Biomimetic Blood, the wall dissolves... Before you, numerous mysterious emblems emerge, and you decide to...

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: With the aid of your Insight, you discern the hidden line patterns on the door. After smearing the lines with Biomimetic Blood, the wall dissolves... Before you, numerous mysterious emblems emerge, and you decide to...

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: With the aid of your Insight, you discern the hidden line patterns on the door. After smearing the lines with Biomimetic Blood, the wall dissolves... Before you, numerous mysterious emblems emerge, and you decide to...

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: The moment you hold the emblem, everything else begins to dissolve. When you come back to your senses, the hidden wall has vanished without a trace, but the emblem remains in your hand.

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: The moment you hold the emblem, everything else begins to dissolve. When you come back to your senses, the hidden wall has vanished without a trace, but the emblem remains in your hand.

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: The moment you hold the emblem, everything else begins to dissolve. When you come back to your senses, the hidden wall has vanished without a trace, but the emblem remains in your hand.

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: The moment you hold the emblem, everything else begins to dissolve. When you come back to your senses, the hidden wall has vanished without a trace, but the emblem remains in your hand.

Title: Mysterious Wall
EventDesc: The moment you hold the emblem, everything else begins to dissolve. When you come back to your senses, the hidden wall has vanished without a trace, but the emblem remains in your hand.

Title: Mysterious Wall
TitleContent: You pick up the wooden crate.
EventDesc: As you gently touch the wall, it crumbles loudly, leaving behind only a wooden crate buried under rubble.

OptionDesc[1]: Follow the moonlight (requires activation of Insight)
Title: Crimson Moon
EventDesc: You find yourself enveloped in a dense fog, which seems to be an illusion created by a congregation of Crimson creatures. Above, a vague silhouette of a red moon shines down. Gazing at the eerie moonlight, you decide to...

Title: Crimson Moon
EventDesc: Following the moonlight, the crimson moon seems to whisper to you. Acknowledging your wisdom, it decides to offer its assistance.

Title: Crimson Moon
RoleContent: You resist the moonlight and leave the place.
EventDesc: You turn away from the moonlight, using your strong will to break free from the illusion and collecting some Biomimetic Blood.

OptionDesc[2]: Take note of the story silently
Title: The Legend of the "Demon"
RoleContent: Just defeated that demon, and who would've thought it... Want to know what happens next? Support me with a Tinbread Cookie!
EventDesc: Inside the tavern, a storyteller weaves a tale about a sea demon. It seems you can spare a few coins to hear him spin the yarn just for you.

Title: The Legend of the "Demon"
TitleContent: The storyteller shares the story with you.
RoleContent: Let me tell ya, there might be more than one of those demons. Be careful out there, very careful!
EventDesc: Grateful for your generosity, the storyteller shares the story of the "demon"—a mythical creature lurking in the ocean depths. The demon resembles a fierce shark and seems to be fixated on a mysterious item. Perhaps the sea fortress holds some clues, so the storyteller hopes you can accept this collectible and help prove the legend.

Title: The Legend of the "Demon"
EventDesc: Feigning indifference to these stories, you turn and retell them to others in the same manner. Soon, you've earned yourself a lot of Tinbread Cookies.

Title: The "Demon" Recipe
TitleContent: An antique book lies there silently.
RoleContent: An antique book lies there silently.
EventDesc: Hidden in a room in the fortress is an antique book about the legends of a demon. The book mentions a mysterious potion that can lure the "demon" out. You could try crafting the potion using some materials, or perhaps take this seemingly valuable book.

Title: The "Demon" Recipe
EventDesc: You've used some materials and successfully concocted... the "potion." The weird thing is, it looks... incredibly tasty?

Title: The "Demon" Recipe
TitleContent: You manage to sell off this antique book.
RoleContent: You manage to sell off this antique book.
EventDesc: You have no interest in legends, but you know this book will fetch a good price.

OptionDesc[1]: Set up the milkshake to attract the real demon
OptionDesc[2]: Hunker down and wait here. Maybe there's a surprise.
OptionDesc[3]: Not my concern. Gotta focus on the journey.
Title: The "Demon" Appears
EventDesc: You seem to have stumbled upon a hunting ground. The smell of milkshake fills the air. This seems to be where the legendary "demon" was sighted. You decide to...

Title: The "Demon" Appears
EventDesc: The moment you set the milkshakes down, two demons appear beside you—Shark-speare, no less! They're eyeing your milkshake with a fierce hunger. Looks like you can't escape.

Title: The "Demon" Appears
RoleContent: Shark-speare is waiting for prey. What are you waiting for?
EventDesc: While scouting for an ambush spot, you bump into a demon in hiding. It seems different from the legendary one, but there's no backing down from this encounter.

Title: The "Demon" Appears
TitleContent: Better to just leave this place.
RoleContent: Better to just leave this place.
EventDesc: You couldn't care less about the stuff of legends and press on toward your journey's end.
